message.name: MILESTONE_ADDED
message.locale: Timer created for %1s with an expected start date of %2d

message.name: MILESTONE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Timer created for %1s has been modified

message.name: MILESTONE_CANCELLED
message.locale: Timer created for %1s has been cancelled

message.name: MILESTONE_INPROGRESS
message.locale: Timer created for %1s is in progress

message.name: MILESTONE_COMPLETED
message.locale: Timer created for %1s has been completed

message.name: MILESTONE_WAIVER_REQUEST_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Extension request for the timer created for %1s has been submitted for approval

message.name: MILESTONE_WAIVER_REQUEST_APPROVED
message.locale: Extension request for the timer created for %1s has been approved

message.name: MILESTONE_WAIVER_REQUEST_REJECTED
message.locale: Extension for the timer created for %1s has been rejected
